name: 黃正民
objective:
一、線性連立方程式
二、矩陣基本運算
三、行列式
四、向量空間與基底
五、線性相依與線性獨立
六、線性轉換
七、正交空間
八、特徵值與特徵向量
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction, Vectors, Linear Equations
Week 2. Matrix Operations, Factorization
Week 3. Transposes, Permutations, Vector Space
Week 4. Null Space, Rank
Week 5. Row Reduced Form, Complete Solution to Ax=b
Week 6. Independence, Basis, Dimension
Week 7. The Four Subspaces, Orthogonality
Week 8. Projection, Least Squares Approximations, Orthogonal Bases, Gram-Schmidt
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Determinants, Cofactors
Week 11. Cramer’s Rule, Inverses, Volumes
Week 12. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors, Diagonalization
Week 13. Symmetric Matrices, Positive Definite Matrices
Week 14. Similar Matrices, Singular Value Decomposition
Week 15. Linear Transformations
Week 16. Change of Basis, Diagonalization
Week 17. Pseudoinverse
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework (with Matlab programming) 30%
Midterm Exam (closed book)         35%
Final Exam (closed book)           35%
materials:
-Textbook
David C. Lay, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, 4th ed., Pearson, 2011.
-Reference
Gilbert Strang, Introduction to Linear Algebra, 4th ed., Wellesley-Cambridge Press, 2009.
